  • mixk.utils.Timer

Source code for mixk.utils.Timer

import time



[docs]class Timer:


[docs]    @classmethod
    def now(cls) -> float:
        return time.perf_counter()



[docs]    @classmethod
    def passed_seconds(cls, start: float, end: float) -> float:
        return end - start



[docs]    @classmethod
    def run_time(cls, func):

        def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
            start = Timer.now()
            result = func(*args, **kwargs)
            passed_time = Timer.passed_seconds(start=start, end=Timer.now())
            return result, passed_time

        return wrapper




[docs]def batch_iter(dataloader):
    now = Timer.now()
    for idx, batch_data in enumerate(dataloader):
        data_time = Timer.passed_seconds(start=now, end=Timer.now())
        yield idx, batch_data, data_time
        now = Timer.now()
